name: GEORGE - a Time Bending Platformer.
description:
GEORGE is a Third person, Parkour game inspired by Mirror's Edge, Portal and Superhot.

Play as a course testing red robot named "George".
The game is set in a place called "The Towers" a facility built for infinite course testing. oh... I forgot to mention, you can reverse time.

Controls:
Movement: W, A, S, D - Jump: Space - Run: Shift - Time Manipulation: Right Click

This game was built in three days as a challenge that turned into a little project I wanted to get out there.

If you enjoyed, please leave some feedback! if you happen to run across any bugs please tell me, there will be more updates with new levels and further plot progression.

Road Map:

Patches/New Maps - Whenever I want to!

Major Update 1: Mid - Late Summer

Major Update 2: Mid - Late Autumn

Credit: Invector for the Third person controller, Brackeys for the Time Rewind script, Kink Master (aka Clay) for some awesome recordings & My Brother for Level Improvments and Play testing.
